name: Scenario C: Rejection
description: 4-storey commercial project rejected at planning review for zoning non-compliance
rejectionReason: Site falls within designated Green Belt zone GB-12. Commercial development of this scale is not permitted under current planning policy. The proposed 4-storey height exceeds the 2-storey limit for Green Belt exceptions. Applicant advised to consult with planning department before resubmission.

2.structuralNotes: Raft foundation suitable for 4-storey commercial loading on clay subsoil. Ground investigation reveals stable bearing capacity. No issues with structural integrity.

3.planningNotes: REJECTED: Site is within Green Belt zone GB-12. Commercial development not permitted at this scale. 4-storey height exceeds 2-storey Green Belt exception limit. Applicant should consult planning department before resubmission.
